articles.description: Lawmakers are rushing to extend the federal government's key relief program for small business owners as the deadline to apply for a loan from the Paycheck Protection Program approaches with more than $110 billion still untouched.

articles.title: Massachusetts to get 8,000 ‘unexpected’ Johnson & Johnson COVID vaccines this week, officials say - MassLive.com
articles.description: Of the 170,000 first doses the state is set to get this week, 8,000 will be Johnson & Johnson’s vaccine, marking a "modest increase," officials said.
